el: Ποιο είναι το επίπεδο της δραστηριότητάς σας;
it: Qual è il tuo livello di attività?

en:
Resting, sitting at ease.
Breathing not challenged.
da: Hvile eller stillesiddende med meget lavt aktivitetsniveau
nl:
Resting, sitting at ease.
Breathing not challenged.
sv:
Resting, sitting at ease.
Breathing not challenged.
no:
Hviler, sitter i ro.
Pusten er ikke forstyrret.
el: Ξεκούραση, καθιστός/η σε ηρεμία. Η αναπνοή είναι κανονική
es:
Descansando, sentado a gusto.
Respiración no desafiada.
fr:
Se reposer, s'asseoir à l'aise.
Respiration non perturbée.

en:
Light manual work:
writing, typing, drawing, book-keeping.
Easy to breathe and carry on a conversation.
da: Let manuelt arbejde: siddende eller stående uden fysiske udfordringer
nl:
Light manual work:
writing, typing, drawing, book-keeping.
Easy to breathe and carry on a conversation.
sv:
Light manual work:
writing, typing, drawing, book-keeping.
Easy to breathe and carry on a conversation.
no: Lett manulet arbeid: skriving, tegning, bokføring. Lett å puste og føre en  samtale.
el: Ελαφριά χειρονακτική εργασία:\ γράψιμο, δακτυλογραφία, ζωγραφική, τήρηση λογιστικών βιβλίων.\ Ευκολία στην αναπνοή και την διεξαγωγή συζήτησης.
it: Leggero lavoro manuale: scrittura, disegno, contabilità. Sia la respirazione che l’intrattenimento di una coversazione sono facili.
de:
Leichte manuelle Arbeit:
schreiben, zeichnen, Buchführung.
Leicht zu atmen und Gespräche zu führen.
es:
Trabajo manual ligero:
escritura, mecanografía, dibujo, contabilidad.
Fácil de respirar y mantener una conversación.
fr:
Travail manuel léger : écrire, taper à l'ordinateur, dessiner, tenir des comptes.
Facile de respirer et de tenir une conversation.

en: Walking 2.5 - 5.5km/h. Sustained arm and hand work: handling moderately heavy machinery, weeding, picking fruits.
da: Moderat aktivitet - svarer til gang ved 2.5-5.5 km/t eller lignende vedvarende arm-/overkrops-arbejde.
nl: Walking 2.5 - 5.5km/h. Sustained arm and hand work: handling moderately heavy machinery, weeding, picking fruits.
sv: Walking 2.5 - 5.5km/h. Sustained arm and hand work: handling moderately heavy machinery, weeding, picking fruits.
no: Gå 2.5-5.5 km/t. Vedvarende arm- og håndarbeid: håndtering av moderat tungt maskiner, luke plukke frukt.
el: Περπάτημα 2,5 - 5,5χιλ/ώρα.Συνεχής δουλειά με τους ώρους και τα χέρια: χειρισμός σχετικά βαρέων μηχανημάτων, ξεχορτιάριασμα, μάζεμα φρούτων
it: Camminata a 2,5-5,5 km / h. Lavori di braccia e manuali persistenti: movimentazione di macchinari pesanti, diserbatura, raccolta di frutti.
de: Gehen 2,5 - 5,5 km/h. Andauernd Arm- und Handarbeit: Handhabung moderat schwerer Maschinen, jäten, obst pflücken
es: Caminando 2.5 - 5.5km/h. Trabajo sostenido de brazos y manos: manejo de maquinaria moderadamente pesada, deshierbe, recolección de frutas.
fr: Marcher à 2,5 - 5,5km/h. Travail soutenu des bras et des mains : manutentionner des machines moyennement lourdes, désherber, cueillir des fruits.

en: Intense arm and trunk work: carrying heavy material, shovelling, sawing, hand mowing, concrete block laying.
da: Intens aktivitet: Fx bære tunge materialer, slå græs, grave, lægge brosten eller cykle med moderat tempo (15-25 km/t).
nl: Intense arm and trunk work: carrying heavy material, shovelling, sawing, hand mowing, concrete block laying.
sv: Intense arm and trunk work: carrying heavy material, shovelling, sawing, hand mowing, concrete block laying.
no: Intens armarbeid: bæring av tungt materiale, måking, saging, håndklipping, betongblokklegging.
el: Έντονη δουλειά με το μπράτσο και τον κορμό: κουβάλημα βαρέων υλικών, φτυάρισμα, πριόνισμα, κόψιμο με το χέρι, τοποθέτηση τσιμεντόλιθων.
it: Intenso lavoro di braccia e tronco: trasporto di materiale pesante, guarnizione, segatura, taglio manuale, posatura di blocchi di calcestruzzo.
de: Intensive Armarbeit: Tragen schwerer Materialien, Sägen, Rasenmähen von Hand, Betonblöcke legen.
es: Trabajo intenso en el brazo y el tronco: llevar material pesado, palear, aserrar, cortar a mano, colocar bloques de hormigón.
fr: Travail intense des bras et du tronc : porter du matériel lourd, pelleter, scier, tondre manuellement, poser des blocs de béton.

en:
Very intense activity at fast maximum pace:
working with an axe, climbing stairs, running on level surface.
da:
Meget intens aktivitet (fysisk krævende tempo):
fx løb, gå på trapper, cykling med mere end 25 km/t
nl:
Very intense activity at fast maximum pace:
working with an axe, climbing stairs, running on level surface.
sv:
Very intense activity at fast maximum pace:
working with an axe, climbing stairs, running on level surface.
no:
Veldig intens aktivitet i raskt maksimalt tempo:
arbeider med en øks, klatrer trapper, løper på jevn overflate.
el: Πολύ έντονη δραστηριότητα στο μέγιστο ρυθμό:\ χρήση τσεκουριού, ανέβασμα σε σκάλες, τρέξιμο σε επίπεδη επιφάνεια.
it: Attività molto intensa a ritmi massimi elevati: lavorare con l'ascia, salire le scale, corsa su piano
de:
Sehr intensive Aktivität in hohem Tempo:
arbeiten mit Axt, Treppen hoch gehen, rennen auf ebener Unterlage.
es: Actividad muy intensa a un ritmo rápido máximo: trabajar con un hacha, subir escaleras, correr en una superficie nivelada.
fr: Activité très intense à un rythme élevé maximum : travailler avec une hache, monter des escaliers, courir sur surface plane.

en: What type of clothing are you wearing?
da: Hvilken type tøj har du på?
nl: What type of clothing are you wearing?
sv: What type of clothing are you wearing?
no: Hva slaggs klær har du på?
el: Ποιο είναι το είδος της ενδυμασίας που φοράτε;
it: Che tipo di indumenti stai indossando?
de: Welche Art von Kleider tragen Sie?

en: Loose fitting, short clothing. Typical for summer.
da: Løst siddende tøj, lette lag. Typisk for sommervejr.
nl: Loose fitting, short clothing. Typical for summer.
sv: Loose fitting, short clothing. Typical for summer.
no: Løse klær, shorts og kjoler. Typiske sommerklær.
el: Φαρδιά, κοντά ρούχα. Συνηθισμένα για το καλοκαίρι.
it: Vestiti larghi, vestiti corti. Tipici dell'estate.
de: Lose Kleider, kurze Kleider, typisch für Sommer
es: Ropa holgada o corta. Típico para el verano.
fr: Vêtements amples, courts. Typique pour l'été.

en: Casual attire, clothing common in informal setting
da: Casual attire, clothing common in informal setting
nl: Casual attire, clothing common in informal setting
sv: Casual attire, clothing common in informal setting
no: Casual attire, clothing common in informal setting
el: Casual attire, clothing common in informal setting
it: Casual attire, clothing common in informal setting
de: Casual attire, clothing common in informal setting
es: Casual attire, clothing common in informal setting
fr: Casual attire, clothing common in informal setting

en: Regular business suit. Clothing common in offices.
da: Jakkesæt, bukser og langærmet sweat-shirt eller lignende; kontorpåklædning
nl: Regular business suit. Clothing common in offices.
sv: Regular business suit. Clothing common in offices.
no: Jobbklær som dress, vanlig på kontorer.
el: Επαγγελματικά κουστούμια. Πιο συχνά σε γραφεία.
it: Completo regolare da business. Comune negli uffici.
es: Traje regular de negocios. Ropa común en oficinas.
fr: Costume d'affaires classique. Plus commun dans les bureaux.

en: Generally taken to be coveralls over work clothes.
da: Heldragt eller andet ekstra lag uden på arbejdstøj
nl: Generally taken to be coveralls over work clothes.
sv: Generally taken to be coveralls over work clothes.
el: Προστατευτικές φόρμες πάνω από τα ρούχα της δουλειάς.
it: In genere considerate tute da meccanico sopra i vestiti da lavoro
es: Generalmente se considera como un overol que se usa sobre ropa de trabajo.
fr: Généralement considéré comme combinaison au dessus des vêtements de travail.

en: Woven fabric that includes treated cotton.
nl: Woven fabric that includes treated cotton.
sv: Woven fabric that includes treated cotton.
el: Υφαντό ύφασμα που περιλαμάνει επεξεργασμένο βαμβάκι
it: Tessuto intrecciato che comprende il cotone trattato.
fr: Tissu tissé contenant du coton traité.

en: The wrap-around apron configuration was designed to protect the front and sides of the body against spills from chemical agents.
da: Heldragt/beskyttelsestøj som dækker større dele af kroppen (fx arbejdstøj til kemisk eller mekanisk beskyttelse).
nl: The wrap-around apron configuration was designed to protect the front and sides of the body against spills from chemical agents.
sv: The wrap-around apron configuration was designed to protect the front and sides of the body against spills from chemical agents.
no: Heldragt og forkle som beskytter kroppens front of sider.
el: Διαμορφωμένη περιτύλιξη που σχεδιάστηκε για να προστατεύει το μπροστινό μέρος και τα πλευρά του σώματος από τις διαρροές χημικών.
it: La configurazione del grembiule è stata progettata per proteggere la parte anteriore e i lati del corpo da versamenti di agenti chimici.
de: Die Wickelschürzen-Konfiguration wurde entwickelt, um die Vorderseite und Seiten des Körpers vor dem Austreten chemischer Substanzen zu schützen.
es: La configuración envolvente del delantal fue diseñada para proteger el frente y los lados del cuerpo contra derrames de agentes químicos.
fr: Le tablier de protection a été conçu pour protéger l'avant et les côtés du corps de renversements de produits chimiques.

en: Vapour-barrier clothing in a single layer.
da: Tøj med regn/vandbeskyttende barriere (uden på almindelig beklædning)
nl: Vapour-barrier clothing in a single layer.
sv: Vapour-barrier clothing in a single layer.
no: Klær i ett lag med dampbarriere
el: Αδιάβροχη ενδυμασία με μια μόνο στρώση.
it: Indumenti con barriera al vapore in un unico strato.
de: Kleider in einer Schicht mit Dampfbarriere
es: Ropa de una sola capa que actua como barrera de vapor.

en: Winter clothing, multiple layers including a thick coat.
da: Vintertøj med flere lag - inklusiv tyk frakke eller lignende
nl: Winter clothing, multiple layers including a thick coat.
sv: Winter clothing, multiple layers including a thick coat.
no: Vinterklær, flere lag inkludert en tykk frakk.
el: Χειμερινά ρούχα, πολλαπλά στρώματα μαζί με ένα χοντρό. παλτό
it: Indumenti invernali, diversi strati che includono un cappotto spesso.
de: Winterkleidung, mehrere Schichten inklusive eine Winterjacke.
es: Ropa de invierno, varias capas, incluido un abrigo grueso.
fr: Vêtements d'hiver, multiples couches incluant un manteau épais.

en: In what year were you born?
nl: In what year were you born?
sv: In what year were you born?
no: I hvilket år ble du født?

en: Which units of measurements would you prefer?
nl: Which units of measurements would you prefer?
sv: Which units of measurements would you prefer?

en: Are there any open windows in the room?
da: Er der nogle åbne vinduer i rummet?
nl: Are there any open windows in the room?
sv: Are there any open windows in the room?
no: Finns det noen åpne vinduer i rommet?
el: Υπάρχουν καθόλου ανοικτά παράθυρα στο δωμάτιο;
it: Ci sono finestre aperte nella tua stanza?
de: Gibt es offene Fenster im Raum?
fr: Y a-t-il des fenêtres ouvertes dans la pièce ?

en: Input the windspeed you would like to use
da: Angiv den vindhastighed du kunne tænke dig at benytte
nl: Input the windspeed you would like to use
sv: Input the windspeed you would like to use
no: Spesifiser den vindfarten du ønsker å bruke
el: Εισάγεται την ταχύτητα του ανέμου που θα θέλατε να χρησιμοποιήσετε
it: Specificare la velocità del vento che si desidera utilizzare
de: Geben Sie die Windgeschwindigkeit ein, die Sie verwenden wollen
es: Ingresa la velocidad del viento que te gustaría usar
fr: Entrer la vitesse du vent que vous souhaitez utiliser

en: Input the humidity you would like to use
da: Angiv den luftfugtighed du kunne tænke dig at benytte
nl: Input the humidity you would like to use
sv: Input the humidity you would like to use
no: Spesifiser den luftfuktigheten du ønsker å bruke
el: Εισάγεται την υγρασία που θα θέλατε να χρησιμοποιήσετε
it: Specificare l'umidità che si desidera utilizzare
de: Geben Sie die Luftfeuchtigkeit ein, die Sie verwenden wollen
es: Ingresa la humedad exterior que te gustaría usar
fr: Entrer l'humidité que vous souhaitez utiliser

it: Stai indossando un qualunque tipo di copricapo?
es: ¿Tienes puesto o estás usando algo para la cabeza?

en: Wearing a hood of any fabric ..
da: Bærer hjelm eller hætte/hovedbeklædning af stof
nl: Wearing a hood of any fabric ..
sv: Wearing a hood of any fabric ..
no: Hjelm eller hette i ethvert stoff
it: Casco o cappuccio in qualsiasi tessuto
de: Helm oder Mütze aus jedem Stoff
es: Estas usando una capucha de cualquier tela.
fr: Porte une capuche de n'importe quelle matière ..
